name: Pentatonic Bells
description:
Variety MegaJam 2020 - Theme 3: Ringing Bell

A tiny educational music game using the pentatonic scale - you can't make it sound bad.

Left-click with the mouse or touch the screen on the different bells to get different notes.

Software:
Game engine: ct.js
Art: Affinity Designer
Music: Beepbox.co
